column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Was really disappointed with the deep dish pizza here. Not sure if it was overhyped or not
column2: but after trying one it certainly did not live up to the hype. The crust was tasty but thats it. The meat and sauce were all tasteless. We took 2 bites each and threw away the remaining. Maybe it was just an outlier but we were certaintly disappointed coming to Chicago wanting to try their signature pizza.
